            :ARG2 (p / person

                        :op1 "Samantha"
                        :op2 "Ness")))
      :snt2 (p2 / person
            :ARG0-of (t / teach-01
                  :ARG1 (s2 / school
                        :mod (g / grade)))

                  :name (n3 / name
                        :op1 "Minnesota"))
            :domain s)

                              :ARG1 (s4 / school)
                              :ARG2 (d / director))
                        :poss (s5 / she))
                  :ARG2 (p5 / phone-number-entity
                        :value "651"
                        :value 8100))))
